name: Push Switch
description: Activates a variable when pressed against a wall.

fields.name: Enabled Variable
fields.description: The variable that gets activated when the push switch is pressed against a wall.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The direction the switch is pressed towards.

2.name: West
2.description: The switch is pressed towards the West.

6.name: North
6.description: The switch is pressed towards the North.

fields.name: Duration
fields.description: The duration for which the switch remains active once pressed.
